{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:59.560
    | text      = Have you ever had a conflict of interest?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:02.760
    | text      = Have you ever been in a position to have a conflict of interest?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:05.239
    | text      = Do you know what I'm saying?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:06.239
    | text      = The most I can think is like when I used to manage a movie theater back in my younger
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:10.319
    | text      = days, I was friends with some of the employees.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:13.439
    | text      = And so I think there's probably a bit of a conflict of interest there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:16.560
    | text      = It's tough to discipline people who are your subordinates, but at the same time you might
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:22.120
    | text      = have to write somebody up who's your friend.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:24.800
    | text      = Or at least there's friendly relations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:27.039
    | text      = Because I was a concessionist and then a projectionist alongside these people and then got promoted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:32.520
    | text      = to manager.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:33.520
    | text      = Right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:34.520
    | text      = And so two weeks ago, I was just...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:37.120
    | text      = So the tension between labor and management soon became very real for you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:40.599
    | text      = It never really got that bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:42.199
    | text      = It was a movie theater in small town.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:45.319
    | text      = There was never a crisis of conflict of interest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:48.719
    | text      = But certainly I think I'm a 35-year-old man now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:52.159
    | text      = I can look back on how I behaved as a 19-year-old movie theater manager, and I can say I probably
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:58.439
    | text      = was far more lenient.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:00.120
    | text      = I probably treated people differently, let's say.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:03.139
    | text      = People I liked and were my friends.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:04.139
    | text      = Due to a conflict of interest, perhaps.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:05.680
    | text      = Yeah, probably.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:06.680
    | text      = I never got to an abusive authority, never fired anybody or did anything like that just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:12.159
    | text      = because I didn't like somebody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:13.740
    | text      = But I probably was ruder.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:15.560
    | text      = Yeah, well, I mean, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:17.560
    | text      = You were Stanford Prisoning Experimented, I suppose.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:21.199
    | text      = Something along those lines.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:22.199
    | text      = It was a weird period of time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:23.939
    | text      = The idea that three people who weren't even out of college age were running an entire
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:30.500
    | text      = theater without a general manager for at least a couple month stretch of time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:36.080
    | text      = That's very funny.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:37.080
    | text      = Yeah, it was bizarre.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:38.080
    | text      = That's weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:39.080
    | text      = But we did the best we could, and it didn't go out of business, so that's great.
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:41.080

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:48.039
    | text      = Certainly not that high level.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:49.039
    | text      = A lot of those decisions were probably made at corporate levels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:52.039
    | text      = But in terms of like, you know, reordering supplies and like putting in work orders.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:56.759
    | text      = Really?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:57.759
    | text      = Yeah, scheduling movies, renting the films from the companies to play in the...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:02.360
    | text      = Yeah, there was a lot of admin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:04.360

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:39.839

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
